about_the_game:
Whispers of the Void is a narrative-driven sci-fi adventure designed for VR. It tells a breathtaking science fiction story full of twists and turns, immersing you into an ancient space civilization's rich, tactile world.

You are a relic hunter, a rare breed brave enough to explore space. Commissioned by an old friend to retrieve a peculiar artifact from the desert planet Arena, you are unexpectedly thrust into the heart of a galaxy-wide struggle for control. This conspiracy holds the key to the future.



As you pilot your spaceship through uncharted asteroid belts, your mission becomes more than a simple retrieval. Engage in VR combat that features gunplay and sword fighting, solve intricate puzzles, and unlock the secrets of the resource Edem and the ancient civilizations that once warred over it.

In Whispers of the Void, each discovery offers a piece of the puzzle that could stitch the galaxy back together — or tear it apart.



The Galactic Confederation has kept a tenuous peace between the galaxy’s three dominant civilizations. Yet its diplomacy failed to avert a war over the galaxy’s most crucial resource: a substance called Edem.

Soon, the conflict inevitably focused on the only known source of Edem in the galaxy: a lone planet in the Yarus system. However, the climactic battle reached a dramatic conclusion when the planet imploded, annihilating thousands of ships and creating a vast, all-consuming void in its stead.

With the great warring fleets in retreat, the Yarus system stood abandoned. And thus began the scarcity of Edem, transforming it from an abundant resource to the rarest in the galaxy, found only in the debris circling the void — an aftermath of what historians would later call the Great Collapse of the Three Pillars…

FEATURES


- Explore ancient tombs and alien landscapes, with each environment carefully crafted for immersive interaction in VR;

- Pilot your spaceship, navigate between planets, and engage with onboard systems like the galaxy map;

- Solve environmental puzzles that reveal more about the universe of the game and the mystery behind Edem;

- Fight enemies with guns or swords, making full use of the VR interface to outsmart and outmaneuver your foes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10\11
  • Processor: Ryzen 2600x \ I5-10300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 \ Radeon RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR compatible devices
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10\11
  • Processor: Ryzen 5600x \ Intel I5-12600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 3060 Ti \ Radeon RX 6700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR compatible devices
